text.value: Farmer: Here young traveler. I come from north seeking for help. There are a few warriors plundering my town. Would you help me?
Go to the town and surroundings and kill up to 5 enemies. Gold: 100.
Well done! You have gained the trust of these people please try to lead us through this rough times
You can build a barrack now!(use b key) and buy some soldiers!
Villager: Hi Leader, We have detected some hostil enemies that control this territoy... We need to do something with the turrets!
Head east to find this turrets and take control over them. Gold: 300
